title: Zimbabwe: Medicines Authority Warns Against Fake 'Approvals' After Product Seizure

title: European report: Antimicrobial resistance remains widespread in foodborne bacteria
desc: Antimicrobial resistance (AMR) in common foodborne bacteria such as Salmonella and Campylobacter continues to be a public health concern across Europe, according to a new joint report from the European Food Safety Authority (EFSA) and the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC).
